message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper deals with the problem of semantic similarity in short text fragments, which is a common topic in computational linguistics (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the use of distributed word representations, which is a popular technique in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper proposes a hybrid method that combines different techniques, which is a common theme in interdisciplinary research (cs.SI).
